original_text: Someone told Rebekah what her older son, Esau, had said. So she told her younger son, Jacob, to come to her. She said to him, ‘Your brother Esau wants to kill you, because of what you did to him.
korean_text: 맏아들 에서의 이 말이 리브가에게 들리매 이에 사람을 보내어 작은 아들 야곱을 불러 그에게 이르되 네 형 에서가 너를 죽여 그 한을 풀려 하니

sentences.original_text: what her older son, Esau, had said
So she told her younger son, Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 그녀의 막내 아들 야곱에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: Your brother Esau wants to kill you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 형 에서가 너를 죽이려고 해

sentences.original_text: because of what you did to him
